This figure shows time-series data for Monthly North Pacific Gyre Oscillation Index (y-axis, NPGO) from 1981 to 2020 (x-axis, Year). The mean of the full time series was 0.14 (lower standard deviation = -1.01, upper standard deviation = 1.29). The index was more than one standard deviation above the mean of the full time series in 1988, 1988, 1988, 1988, 1988, 1988, 1988, 1989, 1998, 1999, 1999, 1999, 1999, 1999, 1999, 1999, 1999, 1999, 2000, 2000, 2000, 2000, 2000, 2000, 2000, 2000, 2000, 2000, 2000, 2000, 2001, 2001, 2001, 2001, 2001, 2001, 2001, 2001, 2001, 2001, 2001, 2002, 2002, 2002, 2002, 2002, 2002, 2002, 2003, 2003, 2007, 2008, 2008, 2008, 2008, 2008, 2008, 2008, 2008, 2010, 2010, 2010, 2010, 2010, 2011, 2011, 2012, 2012, 2012, 2012, 2012, 2012, 2012 and 2012. The index was more than one standard deviation below the mean of the full time series in 1981, 1982, 1985, 1985, 1985, 1986, 1986, 1990, 1991, 1992, 1992, 1992, 1992, 1992, 1992, 1992, 1993, 1993, 1993, 1993, 1993, 1993, 1993, 1993, 1993, 1993, 1993, 1994, 1994, 1994, 1994, 1994, 1994, 1994, 1994, 1995, 1995, 1995, 1995, 1995, 1995, 1996, 1996, 1996, 1996, 1996, 1996, 1996, 1997, 1997, 2005, 2005, 2005, 2005, 2005, 2005, 2005, 2005, 2005, 2005, 2006, 2006, 2013, 2015, 2015, 2015, 2015, 2015, 2015, 2015, 2015, 2015, 2015, 2016, 2017, 2017, 2017, 2018, 2018, 2018, 2018, 2018, 2018, 2018, 2018, 2018, 2018, 2018, 2018, 2019, 2019, 2019, 2019, 2019, 2019, 2019, 2019, 2019, 2019, 2019, 2020, 2020, 2020, 2020, 2020, 2020 and 2020. The index was -1.25 in 2020, the most recent year of the time series.
